external_references.description: Harbison, M. and Renals, P. (2022, July 5). When Pentest Tools Go Brutal: Red-Teaming Tool Being Abused by Malicious Actors. Retrieved February 1, 2023.

objects.description: [Brute Ratel C4](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1063) has used search order hijacking to load a malicious payload DLL as a dependency to a benign application packaged in the same ISO.(Citation: Palo Alto Brute Ratel July 2022) [Brute Ratel C4](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1063) has loaded a malicious DLL by spoofing the name of the legitimate Version.DLL and placing it in the same folder as the digitally-signed Microsoft binary OneDriveUpdater.exe.(Citation: Palo Alto Brute Ratel July 2022)
